text.0: spread is thy cleansing filter brahmaṇaspati as prince thou enterest its limbs from every side.
text.1: the raw whose mass hath not been heated gains not this they only which are dressed which bear attain to it.
text.2: high in the seat of heaven is spread the scorchers sieve its threads are standing separate glittering with light.
text.3: the swift ones favour him who purifieth this with consciousness they stand upon the height of heaven.
text.4: the foremost spotted steer hath made the mornings shine and yearning after strength sustains all things that be.
text.5: by his high wisdom have the mighty sages wrought the fathers who behold mankind laid down the germ.
text.6: gandharva verily protects his dwellingplace wondrous he guards the generations of the gods.
text.7: lord of the snare he takes the foeman with the snare those who are most devout have gained a share of meath.
text.8: rich in oblations robed in cloud thou corapassest oblation sacrifice the mighty seat of gods.
text.9: king on thy chariotsieve thou goest up to war and with a thousand weapons winnest lofty fame.
